results.title: LEGO Turned Nike ’s Techy Air Max Sneaker Into LEGO Bricks
results.content: LEGO & Nike 's Air Max Dn sneaker is almost everything LEGO fans could ever want. Adidas sort of got it right with its Ultra Boost DNA LEGO and the Stan Smith collab, which featured semi-attachable parts. Even modders have added LEGO plates to sneakers for years.
